entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.

text:
@realDonaldTrump Asswipe.
Canada has less cases of Coronavirus  and its  flights and borders are still open .

The breakdown in USA came when you brought the virus home and did not contain it. 

So ,truely you have done FUCK ALL .... 
Now do your god damned job and ALLOW THE EXPERTS to do theirs
